sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>When making checks to handle, tame, or control animals, the character may add a number of force dice (white d12) no greater than his Force rating to the check. The character may spend force points from the roll to add successes or advantages (character's choice) to the result.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Animal empathy</name> <number>TAL0001005</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 14:52:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>edfd25ecdbe20c542901de90cf9619bd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 15:03:47</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
